channel.title: About on Programming Pedagogy
channel.description: Recent content in About on Programming Pedagogy

item.description: About Me My name is Jeff Normile and I’m a student at Allegheny College pursuing an education in both Computer Science and Communications. As can be inferred from the sidebar, I have a particular interest in the way we learn. I think it behooves any student to think critically about the ways in which they process and synthesize new information into usable, actionable knowledge, though this feels especially important for myself: after a decade in the workforce I decided to pivot and make the return to academia.
